directions: Mix the cranberries, sugar, orange juice, orange zest,  ground cloves, and cinnamon sticks together in a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Lower heat to medium, and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from the heat and cool.
Stir the pomegranate seeds into the cranberry mixture, and refrigerate at least 8 hours or overnight. Remove the cinnamon sticks before serving.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) bag fresh cranberries, rinsed and sorted
title: Holiday Cranberry-Pomegranate Sauce
